item.title: Peak Human - by Johan Norberg
item.description:
Here are some of the notes I made while reading this fascinating book. Absolutely recommed it to someone who wishes to understand how golden ages begin, and how they end - and they all DO end eventually!

The Dutch Republic

  • The discovery of new continents and sea routes shook European consciousness and sparked a new wave of curiosity and knowledge building

Renaissance Italy
